title: Jafar gets revenge on his farther 1x7 (bad blood)
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: I had a lot of sympathy for Jafar seeing his backstory with his father and cowardly half brother.
The fact that Jafar's brother abandoned him like that and didn't even bother with a third option of attempt at peaceful resolution... that's pretty good revenge right there.
This is the only Jafar that is an actually sympathetic character

The real irony in all of this is that, by all possible accounts, Jafar was ultimately the better of the Sultan’s two sons before the Sultan’s unwillingness to accept an illegitimate son screwed everything up.
I guess Jafar's brother was only Second Rate
description: Once upon a time in wonderland flashback- jafar kills his brother  and kidnaps his farther
